subject: Fix chat deletion on mobile web and improve header button layout
body:
- Fix chat deletion not working on mobile web by adding explicit delayLongPress
- Force immediate refetch after chat deletion instead of relying on realtime
- Hide delete (Ã—) button on mobile web, use long-press instead
- Reorganize header buttons: utility buttons right-aligned, refresh with stats
- Remove text labels from buttons, keeping icon-only design

title: Fix chat deletion on mobile web and improve header button layout
